name: The Adventure (Clon135)
description:
This Game was made as a School Projekt. It´s made by Paul, Toni, Florian and Christoph

Instagram:
Toni
Florian

Paul and Toni created all the Levels while Florian Wrote the Story and Christoph Programmed it,

The Game is about to Guys who try to escape the Monsters. you can play in three diferent classes Elf, Wizard and Knight

  • The Elf is an Super fast runner but has no Weapons
  • The Wizard is fast but can Shoot Plasma Balls
  • The Knight is Slow due to his heavy armor and has a Sword 
Credits:
  • The Tileset was made by RottingPixels
  • The Charakters/Monster Sprites where from 0x72
  • The Engine we used was Godot
Play It!

Download the file for your System and Play.
